name: Europa Universalis III Collector's Edition
summary:
This collector's edition contains the following: 
 
- Europa Universalis III 
- Audio disc with the game's soundtrack 
- Composer's diary, complementing the soundtrack 
- Full-colour strategy guide of more than 100 pages 
- Producer introduction to the game 
- Exclusive download content 
- Sizable poster map including all provinces. 
- Collectible stickers
